Title: Motor Homes
Plot: The team attempt to build some interesting motor homes before setting off for a Bank Holiday weekend in the West Country to see how what that they have created holds up. Jeremy test drives the new Audi R8 V10 Spyder and the latest version of Porsche's enduring 911 Turbo cabriolet to see how they compare.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
